constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LOCIND Name: Locally Significant Industrial Site
AAS Name: Area of Archaeological Significance

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required by condition 12(Construction and Environmental Management Plan) and 21(Non-Road Mobile Machinery Register) of Planning Permission Ref: 15/13013/FUL (Demolition of existing building and redevelopment of site to provide  B1 Use Class (Offices) at lower ground, ground and first floor levels and 10 apartments at second, third and fourth floor levels, with ancillary gymnasium at lower ground level)
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Condition 12 (Construction and Environmental Management Plan) and 21 (Non-Road Mobile Machinery Register) of planning permission 15/13013/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and these conditions are hereby fully discharged.

Please be advised that the planning statement marked as 'confidential' cannot be included on this application, as all documents are required to be made available on the council website for public view.If you do wish to  include this document, please confirm by return.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out in person on 11/01/2024.Assessment:Acceptable minor works to reduce a very slight overhang from a hedge made of Cypress & Bay. The works will have no adverse impact upon the health of the trees or upon public amenity.Recommendation:Approve.
